responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "3226581C47078C93012E14A26998B565", "I have heard. The War Council has consulted with the academy\'s ruling magi. At least, ruling on this side of the portal. They seek the Horn of Doom. They thought we might know where in the ruins of Thanalas it might be and what hurdles their striders might face.")
name: MADD_0005B_HOD_AkhundaWadoo_6
